inset.description: Set the indentation distance, plus and minus signs to control the indentation direction, and the default indentation is '72px' when 'true' is passed (horizontal mode only)
inset.description_zh: 设置缩进距离，正负号可控制缩进方向，当传递 `true` 时默认缩进为 `72px`（仅限水平模式）

vertical.description: Whether it is vertical or not

description.description: Textual description of the divider (horizontal mode only)
description.description_zh: 分割线的文字描述（仅限水平模式）

margin.description: Sets the 'margin' property of the split line style
margin.description_zh: 设置分割线样式的 `margin` 属性
